title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, June 15, 2020
description: 100 years ago today, three young black men were lynched in Duluth, Minnesota after being wrongfully accused of raping a white woman.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: 100 years ago today, three young black men were lynched in Duluth, Minnesota after being wrongfully accused of raping a white woman.
itunes:summary: 100 years ago today, three young black men were lynched in Duluth, Minnesota after being wrongfully accused of raping a white woman.
